Title: Teleiotes
Description: Teleiotes is a client side framework written in JavaScript. It can be used to create a rich client side application that can smoothly interact with the server. Unlike many other JavaScript libraries and frameworks, Teleiotes focuses more on easing the life of programmer with a powerful set of APIs that are easy to use. It provides APIs for AJAX based communication, Server interactions, client side Databases and Debugging your applications. It also provides a ‘pretty API’ for quick access of selected framework features.
HomeWiki:
Teleiotes is a client side framework written in JavaScript. It can be used to create a rich client side application that can smoothly interact with the server. The latest version (ver. 2.0) brings many new features that complete the use of Teleiotes as a single solution for almost all client side application programming needs. Unlike many other JavaScript libraries and frameworks, Teleiotes focuses more on easing the life of programmer with a powerful set of APIs that are easy to use. We also provide ‘Pretty API’ for quick access to a set of capabilities of the framework in a matter of a few statements. Though it is the fastest way to use Teleiotes, the expert users might like to have a look at entire API collection.

Key Components/APIs

  • AJAX
  • Server API
  • Storage API
  • Test and Debug API
  • Pretty API
